about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY


Mancers of Magic is an Indie Rogue-like Spell-based Shooter Game that takes place on a variety of diverse islands floating in the skies above.

Collect items to power up your Mancers; level up to grow stronger and conquer each objective the islands demand of you to progress.

MEET THE MANCERS


Nahro the Necromancer
Nahro is known as the Skeleton King of this world. He has the ability to raise his loyal skeletons from the dead to fight for him using his own life force.

Roo the Ranger
Roo is a baby dragon set out to find treasure and destroy all that is in sight. Roo controls elements of Fire and Ice to pummel his opponents with a sharp sense of precision and skill.
